title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the detailed requirements for the quantum encryption system, including security standards (such as NIST PQC, FIPS 140-3), performance targets (latency, throughput, key size), integration with existing systems (military communication networks), user needs (ease of use, compatibility with existing devices), and any other relevant requirements. This will also include a SWOT analysis and risk assessment.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the quantum encryption system, including components, interfaces, and data flow.

title: Develop Quantum Key Distribution Protocol
description: Implement the quantum key distribution protocol for secure key exchange between parties.

title: Implement Encryption/Decryption Algorithms
description: Develop the encryption and decryption algorithms using the quantum-secure keys.

title: Design Secure User Interface and Communication Protocols
description: Design a secure and user-friendly interface for message exchange, along with robust communication protocols to ensure end-to-end encryption and integrity of transmitted data. The design should incorporate security principles such as least privilege access, strong authentication mechanisms, and tamper-evident features.

title: Develop Security Auditing and Monitoring
description: Implement security auditing and monitoring mechanisms to detect and respond to potential threats or attacks.

title: Set up Testing and Validation Environment
description: Establish a testing and validation environment for the quantum encryption system, including simulated attacks and performance benchmarking.

title: Develop Deployment and Integration Plan
description: Create a comprehensive plan for deploying and integrating the quantum encryption system with existing military communication infrastructure. The plan should cover the following key aspects: 1) Infrastructure requirements (hardware, software, network) 2) Integration points and interfaces with legacy systems 3) Deployment strategy (phased rollout, pilot testing, post-deployment monitoring and adjustments) 4) Security and access control measures (including encryption keys management, secure communication channels, and user authentication) 5) Monitoring and maintenance processes (including system health checks, incident response, and regular security audits) 6) Training and documentation for personnel 7) Rollback and contingency plans 8) Collaboration with other teams (such as DevOps, Security, and QA) to ensure seamless integration and operation

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Document the system architecture, components, and usage instructions for the quantum encryption system.
